price: 13. Que vous teniez secrets vos propos ou que vous les révéliez au grand jour, Il Sait parfaitement ce qui est au fond des cœurs.
arabic: وَأَسِرُّواْ قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ ٱجۡهَرُواْ بِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-asirrū qawlakum awi ij'harū bihi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
